#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define s2(a,b) scanf("%d %d",&a,&b)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define vi vector<int>
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define F first
#define S second
#define P printf
typedef long long ll;
#define pl(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
using namespace std;
int arr[11111];
int main()
{

   int t;s(t);
   while(t--)
   {
       int n;s(n);
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)s(arr[i]);
       ll tod=arr[0];
       ll ans=arr[0];
       for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
       {
           ans+=arr[i];
           tod=min(tod,ans/(i+1));
       }
       pl(tod);
       printf("\n");

   }



}
